name: Huevos Ahogados -- Eggs Drowned in Salsa
description: Eggs poached in a traditional Tomato-Jalapeno salsa can do wonders for grumpy mornings!

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the tomatoes and jalapenos in the oven at 400F for 15-20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Roast the tomatoes and jalapenos in the oven at 400F for 15-20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomatoes, jalapenos (de-stemmed), 1/2 white onion, 2 cloves garlic, and 10-12 sprigs cilantro to a blender.  Pulse blend until you have a thick liquid.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tomatoes, jalapenos (de-stemmed), 1/2 white onion, 2 cloves garlic, and 10-12 sprigs cilantro to a blender.  Pulse blend until you have a thick liquid.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a dollop of oil (or lard) to a high-rimmed saucepan.  Saute the salsa mixture from the blender until slightly thickened, 4-6 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a dollop of oil (or lard) to a high-rimmed saucepan.  Saute the salsa mixture from the blender until slightly thickened, 4-6 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2-3 cups of stock and 1/2 teaspoon salt.  Stir well and bring to a boil.  Reduce heat to maintain a steady simmer.  Salt to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 2-3 cups of stock and 1/2 teaspoon salt.  Stir well and bring to a boil.  Reduce heat to maintain a steady simmer.  Salt to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Cracking the eggs in individual bowls makes it easier to slide them into the broth.  Add the eggs to salsa mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Cracking the eggs in individual bowls makes it easier to slide them into the broth.  Add the eggs to salsa mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the eggs 4-6 minutes for runny yolks, or a couple minutes longer for firm yolks.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the eggs 4-6 minutes for runny yolks, or a couple minutes longer for firm yolks.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the eggs in bowls along with plenty of the salsa broth.  Taste for seasoning and garnish with fresh cilantro (optional).
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the eggs in bowls along with plenty of the salsa broth.  Taste for seasoning and garnish with fresh cilantro (optional).

recipeInstructions.text: Corn tortillas, toast, or crispy quesadillas are all good options to dip into the delicious broth.
recipeInstructions.name: Corn tortillas, toast, or crispy quesadillas are all good options to dip into the delicious broth.
